column4: my sound has just gone really quiet... im pretty sure its cos i turned the sound down in a movie playing program, but dont know which one.... and turning it up in the ones i have hasnt helped
try going to the volume control located on your task bar, and then double click on it. There you see other volume controls. One of them is probably down too low.
if i turn off my computer I have to log off of xchat and I wanted to avoid that.
